<a target="_blank" href="https://www.peoplescollection.wales/itesm/19096">Transcription for 19096</a>

Well when I started to work this will give you just some idea the Monday was 7 till 2
Tuesday 7 till 5
Wednesday 7 till 5
Thursday 7 till 5 Friday 7 till 5
Saturday 7 to 2
Now in the winter weather
If you was working till that underground you wouldn't see daylight
after a Monday till the Saturday
